name: Lucy Got Problems
description: Lucy, an airhead succubus spy, was sent into the elven forest to... um... what was she supposed to do?! Uh-oh, she's in trouble! Find out how to survive in the forest full of dangers, complete the Very Important Mission, make new friends or foes, find love, and more!
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows XP 处理器: 1.2 GHz Pentium 4 内存: 512 MB RAM 存储空间: 需要 800 MB 可用空间
